titles.title: HP118 See him lying on a bed of straw

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
See him lying on a bed of straw;
Draughty stable with an open door,
Mary cradling the child she bore
The Prince of Glory is his name:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Star of silver, sweep across the skies,
Show where Jesus in the manger lies;
Shepherd, swiftly from your stupor rise
To see the Saviour of the world.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Angels, sing again the song you sang,
God's great glory and redeeming plan
Sing that Bethlem's little baby can
be the saviour of us all.

verse.name: v4
c1
verse.lines:
O now carry me to Bethlehem
To see the Lord of love again,
Just as poor as was the stable then,
The Prince of Glory when he came.
